name: @drawbotics/vanilla-drylus
description: Vanilla JS/CSS export of component styles and logic
author: nicmosc <nmoscholios@gmail.com>

scripts.watch: npm run watch:react & npm run watch:lib
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run extract-css && npm run build:lib
scripts.build:dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development npm run sync
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run sync
